title: Haruniwa Ie no 3 Nin-me
synopsis: The Haruba family is a wonderful family of three kids. The protagonist is the youngest son of the three siblings, who is in actuality, a spirit. The story unfolds in a nostalgic background of Japan and relates the life of this incredible family.
voices: ['Takeuchi, Junko', 'Takada, Yumi', 'Nagano, Ai', 'Kawashima, Chiyoko', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Sakaguchi, Daisuke', 'Nishihara, Kumiko', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Ichiryuusai, Teiyuu', 'Yamamoto, Yuriko']
staff: [['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']], ['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', ['Planning']], ['Oonishi, Youichi', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
